Joseph M. Galioto Sr.

August 28, 2024

Joseph M. Galioto Sr., 73, of Gallitzin, died Tuesday morning at his home. He was born in Johnstown, son of the late Nicholas and Edith (Albertelli) Galioto. He married the former Margaret M. Reed on Oct. 20, 1973, at St. Patrick Church, Gallitzin. Surviving are his wife; three sons: Joseph ...

Merrill R. Harshberger

August 28, 2024

Merrill R. Harshberger, 84, a resident of Hilltop Healthcare and Rehabilitation Center, formerly of Altoona, passed peacefully in his sleep Tuesday. He was born in Altoona, son of the late Charles L. and Myrle N. (Brannan) Harshberger. He married the former Elaine P. Bishop on Aug. 19, ...

Sheldon (Shell) Ray Kauffman

August 28, 2024

Sheldon (Shell) Ray Kauffman, 89, of Altoona, peacefully passed away Monday Aug. 26, 2024, at UPMC Altoona. Shell was born on Oct. 25, 1934, in Altoona, to William Henry Sr. and Mary Margaret (Halton) Kauffman. Shell was drafted into the Army in 1957 and honorably served his country as a ...

Carol L. (Salem) Metzger

August 28, 2024

Carol L. (Salem) Metzger, 75, of Lewisburg, entered into rest on Sunday, Aug. 18, 2024, at Geisinger Medical Center. Born on Aug. 22, 1948, in Johnstown, she was the daughter of the late William Salem and Edith Salem. On April 20, 1990, she married Samuel Metzger, who passed away on June 19, ...
